title: Exploring Golang Variable Declarations
description: This lab aims to test your understanding of variables in Golang. In Golang, variables are explicitly declared and used by the compiler to check the type-correctness of function calls.

meta.title: Golang Variables | Programming Fundamentals
meta.description: Learn the basics of variable declaration and initialization in Golang, a powerful and efficient programming language.
meta.keywords: Golang, variables, programming, fundamentals, data types

verify.name: Verify Go Variables Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 探索Go语言中的变量声明
i18n.description: 本实验旨在测试你对Go语言中变量的理解。在Go语言中，变量需要显式声明并由编译器用于检查函数调用的类型正确性。

meta.title: Go语言变量 | 编程基础
meta.description: 学习Go语言中变量声明和初始化的基础知识，Go语言是一种强大且高效的编程语言。
meta.keywords: Go语言, 变量, 编程, 基础, 数据类型
